issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description:
When I try to compile Aries with JDK 7, I have:

[ERROR] Failed to execute goal org.apache.maven.plugins:maven-compiler-plugin:2.0.2:compile (default-compile) on project org.apache.aries.testsupport.unit: Compilation failure: Compilation failure:
[ERROR] could not parse error message: warning: [options] bootstrap class path not set in conjunction with -source 1.5
[ERROR] /home/jbonofre/workspace/aries/testsupport/testsupport-unit/src/main/java/org/apache/aries/mocks/BundleMock.java:187: warning: [deprecation] toURL() in File has been deprecated
[ERROR] this(name,properties,location.toURL().toExternalForm());
[ERROR] ^
[ERROR] 
[ERROR] /home/jbonofre/workspace/aries/testsupport/testsupport-unit/src/main/java/org/apache/aries/mocks/BundleMock.java:[239,17] [deprecation] toURL() in File has been deprecated
[ERROR] 
[ERROR] /home/jbonofre/workspace/aries/testsupport/testsupport-unit/src/main/java/org/apache/aries/mocks/BundleMock.java:[263,60] [deprecation] toURL() in File has been deprecated
[ERROR] 
[ERROR] /home/jbonofre/workspace/aries/testsupport/testsupport-unit/src/main/java/org/apache/aries/mocks/BundleMock.java:[328,65] [deprecation] toURL() in File has been deprecated
[ERROR] 

It's due to some parent POM definition which force JDK5 support (target and source).

I don't think that the JDK5 support is still required. I gonna prepare a couple of patches about that.

author.name: tangyong
author.emailAddress: tangyong at cn dot fujitsu dot com

comments.body: The issue still happened on jdk7 using the newest trunk and, while swiching into jdk 6, the issue also happened.

updateAuthor.name: tangyong
updateAuthor.emailAddress: tangyong at cn dot fujitsu dot com

author.name: tangyong
author.emailAddress: tangyong at cn dot fujitsu dot com

comments.body:
Once I switched into jdk 5, the following exception happened,

[ERROR] Failed to execute goal org.apache.maven.plugins:maven-enforcer-plugin:1.
0-beta-1:enforce (default) on project java6-parent: Some Enforcer rules have fai
led. Look above for specific messages explaining why the rule failed. -> [Help 1
]
[ERROR]
[ERROR] To see the full stack trace of the errors, re-run Maven with the -e swit
ch.
[ERROR] Re-run Maven using the -X switch to enable full debug logging.
[ERROR]
[ERROR] For more information about the errors and possible solutions, please rea
d the following articles:
[ERROR] [Help 1] http://cwiki.apache.org/confluence/display/MAVEN/MojoExecutionE
xception
[ERROR]
[ERROR] After correcting the problems, you can resume the build with the command

[ERROR]   mvn <goals> -rf :java6-parent

updateAuthor.name: tangyong
updateAuthor.emailAddress: tangyong at cn dot fujitsu dot com

comments.body: I'm going to use this JIRA to start working through the various Java 7 problems people seem to be hitting.

author.name: tangyong
author.emailAddress: tangyong at cn dot fujitsu dot com

comments.body:
Tim, 

I suggest doing the following :

1) using your patch
2) building the whole aries modules , and once meeting error liking deprecated api(previously I found that on jdk7 building env, many error is related to using deprecated api), adding @SuppressWarnings("deprecation") , then building again to see whether OK.

updateAuthor.name: tangyong
updateAuthor.emailAddress: tangyong at cn dot fujitsu dot com

comments.body:
Hi Tang,

Thanks for the verification of the fix. My investigation shows that the parent pom changes do work, but that some projects may also need some minor source changes. Util, for example, has a strange compile error due to use of generics in the OSGi API (easily fixed by an explicit cast). I'm going to attempt to get a release of the parent poms out next week, and at that point I can start to roll out releases of the other Aries projects. Hopefully we'll have everything sorted soon!

author.name: tangyong
author.emailAddress: tangyong at cn dot fujitsu dot com

comments.body:
Tim,

OK, firstly waiting for parent poms.

Thanks
--Tang

updateAuthor.name: tangyong
updateAuthor.emailAddress: tangyong at cn dot fujitsu dot com

comments.body:
While using specifying version 3.1 (latest release) of the maven-compiler-plugin in parent/default-parent/pom.xml and building the whole aries project, the result is as following:

1 the modules which has been built successfully without modifying any source other than their parent pom version
1) testsupport\testsupport-unit
2) proxy\proxy-impl
3) blueprint\blueprint-core
4) blueprint\blueprint-itests
5) subsystem\subsystem-core
6) util\util
7) application\application-utils
8) application\application-deployment-management
9) application\application-itests
10) application\application-management
11) application\application-modeller
12) application\application-noop-resolver
13) application\application-runtime-framework

2 the modules which has been built successfully by modifying their pom xml files including their parent pom version
1) ejb\openejb-extender
[INFO] ------------------------------------------------------------------------
[ERROR] Failed to execute goal org.apache.maven.plugins:maven-compiler-plugin:3.1:compile (default-compile) on project org.apache.aries.ejb.openejb.extender: Compilation failure: Compilation failure:
[ERROR] /D:/aries/ejb/openejb-extender/src/main/java/org/apache/aries/ejb/openejb/extender/EJBServiceFactory.java:[30,57] 型org.osgi.framework.ServiceFactoryはパラメータをとりません
[ERROR] /D:/aries/ejb/openejb-extender/src/main/java/org/apache/aries/ejb/openejb/extender/EJBServiceFactory.java:[62,26] 型org.osgi.framework.ServiceRegistrationはパラメータをとりません
[ERROR] /D:/aries/ejb/openejb-extender/src/main/java/org/apache/aries/ejb/openejb/extender/EJBServiceFactory.java:[82,26] 型org.osgi.framework.ServiceRegistrationはパラメータをとりません
[ERROR] /D:/aries/ejb/openejb-extender/src/main/java/org/apache/aries/ejb/openejb/extender/RunningApplication.java:[62,47] 型org.osgi.framework.ServiceRegistrationはパラメータをとりません
[ERROR] /D:/aries/ejb/openejb-extender/src/main/java/org/apache/aries/ejb/openejb/extender/OSGiFinder.java:[37,59] シンボルを見つけられません
[ERROR] シンボル:   メソッド listResources(java.lang.String,java.lang.String,int)
[ERROR] 場所: クラス java.lang.Object
[ERROR] /D:/aries/ejb/openejb-extender/src/main/java/org/apache/aries/ejb/openejb/extender/RunningApplication.java:[63,38] 型org.osgi.framework.ServiceRegistrationはパラメータをとりません
[ERROR] /D:/aries/ejb/openejb-extender/src/main/java/org/apache/aries/ejb/openejb/extender/RunningApplication.java:[129,28] 型org.osgi.framework.ServiceRegistrationはパラメータをとりません
[ERROR] -> [Help 1]
[ERROR]
[ERROR] To see the full stack trace of the errors, re-run Maven with the -e switch.
[ERROR] Re-run Maven using the -X switch to enable full debug logging.
[ERROR]
[ERROR] For more information about the errors and possible solutions, please read the following articles:
[ERROR] [Help 1] http://cwiki.apache.org/confluence/display/MAVEN/MojoFailureException

[Fixing][using 4.3.1 rather than 4.3.0]
       <dependency>
    		<groupId>org.osgi</groupId>
    		<artifactId>org.osgi.core</artifactId>
    		<version>4.3.1</version>
    		<scope>provided</scope>
    	</dependency>

Pl. seeing http://blog.osgi.org/2012/10/43-companion-code-for-java-7.html

2) jmx\jmx-core
[INFO] ------------------------------------------------------------------------
[ERROR] Failed to execute goal org.apache.maven.plugins:maven-compiler-plugin:3.1:compile (default-compile) on project org.apache.aries.jmx.core: Compilation failure: Compilation failure:
[ERROR] D:\aries\jmx\jmx-core\src\main\java\org\apache\aries\jmx\util\FrameworkUtils.java:[41,36] 警告:[deprecation] org.osgi.service.packageadminのExportedPackageは推奨されません
[ERROR] D:\aries\jmx\jmx-core\src\main\java\org\apache\aries\jmx\util\FrameworkUtils.java:[42,36] 警告:[deprecation] org.osgi.service.packageadminのPackageAdminは推奨されません
[ERROR] D:\aries\jmx\jmx-core\src\main\java\org\apache\aries\jmx\util\FrameworkUtils.java:[43,36] 警告:[deprecation] org.osgi.service.packageadminのRequiredBundleは推奨されません
[ERROR] D:\aries\jmx\jmx-core\src\main\java\org\apache\aries\jmx\framework\BundleStateMBeanHandler.java:[32,36] 警告:[deprecation] org.osgi.service.packageadminのPackageAdminは推奨されません
[ERROR] D:\aries\jmx\jmx-core\src\main\java\org\apache\aries\jmx\framework\BundleStateMBeanHandler.java:[33,34] 警告:[deprecation] org.osgi.service.startlevelのStartLevelは推奨されません
[ERROR] D:\aries\jmx\jmx-core\src\main\java\org\apache\aries\jmx\framework\PackageStateMBeanHandler.java:[29,36] 警告:[deprecation] org.osgi.service.packageadminのPackageAdminは推奨されません
[ERROR] D:\aries\jmx\jmx-core\src\main\java\org\apache\aries\jmx\codec\ServiceData.java:[85,39] エラー: 型ServiceReferenceはパラメータをとりません
[ERROR] D:\aries\jmx\jmx-core\src\main\java\org\apache\aries\jmx\framework\Framework.java:[41,36] 警告:[deprecation] org.osgi.service.packageadminのPackageAdminは推奨されません
[ERROR] D:\aries\jmx\jmx-core\src\main\java\org\apache\aries\jmx\framework\Framework.java:[42,34] 警告:[deprecation] org.osgi.service.startlevelのStartLevelは推奨されません
[ERROR] D:\aries\jmx\jmx-core\src\main\java\org\apache\aries\jmx\framework\FrameworkMBeanHandler.java:[29,36] 警告:[deprecation] org.osgi.service.packageadminのPackageAdminは推奨されません
[ERROR] D:\aries\jmx\jmx-core\src\main\java\org\apache\aries\jmx\framework\FrameworkMBeanHandler.java:[30,34] 警告:[deprecation] org.osgi.service.startlevelのStartLevelは推奨されません
[ERROR] D:\aries\jmx\jmx-core\src\main\java\org\apache\aries\jmx\codec\PackageData.java:[31,36] 警告:[deprecation] org.osgi.service.packageadminのExportedPackageは推奨されません
[ERROR] D:\aries\jmx\jmx-core\src\main\java\org\apache\aries\jmx\framework\PackageState.java:[33,36] 警告:[deprecation] org.osgi.service.packageadminのExportedPackageは推奨されません
[ERROR] D:\aries\jmx\jmx-core\src\main\java\org\apache\aries\jmx\framework\PackageState.java:[34,36] 警告:[deprecation] org.osgi.service.packageadminのPackageAdminは推奨されません
...

[Fixing][using 4.3.1 rather than 4.3.0]
       <dependency>
    		<groupId>org.osgi</groupId>
    		<artifactId>org.osgi.core</artifactId>
    		<version>4.3.1</version>
    		<scope>provided</scope>
    	</dependency>

Pl. seeing http://blog.osgi.org/2012/10/43-companion-code-for-java-7.html

3) jmx\jmx-itests
[Fixing][using 4.3.1 rather than 4.3.0]
       <dependency>
    		<groupId>org.osgi</groupId>
    		<artifactId>org.osgi.core</artifactId>
    		<version>4.3.1</version>
    		<scope>provided</scope>
    	</dependency>

4) jpa\jpa-container
[Fixing]
- [using 4.3.1 rather than 4.3.0]
       <dependency>
    		<groupId>org.osgi</groupId>
    		<artifactId>org.osgi.core</artifactId>
    		<version>4.3.1</version>
    		<scope>provided</scope>
    	</dependency>

- still having the following exception happen while using 4.3.1
[ERROR] Failed to execute goal org.apache.maven.plugins:maven-compiler-plugin:3.1:compile (default-compile) on project org.apache.aries.jpa.container: Compilation failure: Compilation failure:
[ERROR] /D:/aries/jpa/jpa-container/src/main/java/org/apache/aries/jpa/container/unit/impl/DataSourceFactoryDataSource.java:[36,8] org.apache.aries.jpa.container.unit.impl.DataSourceFactoryDataSourceはabstractでなく、javax.sql.CommonDataSource内のabstractメソッドgetParentLogger()をオーバーライドしません
[ERROR] /D:/aries/jpa/jpa-container/src/main/java/org/apache/aries/jpa/container/tx/impl/XADatasourceEnlistingWrapper.java:[49,8] org.apache.aries.jpa.container.tx.impl.XADatasourceEnlistingWrapperはabstractでなく、javax.sql.CommonDataSource内のabstractメソッドgetParentLogger()をオーバーライドしません
[ERROR] /D:/aries/jpa/jpa-container/src/main/java/org/apache/aries/jpa/container/tx/impl/ConnectionWrapper.java:[49,8] org.apache.aries.jpa.container.tx.impl.ConnectionWrapperはabstractでなく、java.sql.Connection内のabstractメソッドgetNetworkTimeout()をオーバーライドしません
[ERROR] /D:/aries/jpa/jpa-container/src/main/java/org/apache/aries/jpa/container/unit/impl/JndiDataSource.java:[35,8] org.apache.aries.jpa.container.unit.impl.JndiDataSourceはabstractでなく、javax.sql.CommonDataSource内のabstractメソッドgetParentLogger()をオーバーライドしません
[ERROR] -> [Help 1]
[ERROR]

[Fixing]
-ConnectionWrapper.java
Since jdk7, java.sql.Connection has added some new apis, so, ConnectionWrapper class needs to implement these apis.

-JndiDataSource.java
Since jdk7, javax.sql.CommonDataSource has added a new api called "getParentLogger", because DelayedLookupDataSource class implements DataSource which extends CommonDataSource, so, JndiDataSource needs to implement getParentLogger.

-DataSourceFactoryDataSource.java
the same as JndiDataSource.java

-XADatasourceEnlistingWrapper.java
the same as JndiDataSource.java

5)spi-fly\spi-fly-dynamic-bundle
[Fixing]
- [using 4.3.1 rather than 4.3.0]
       <dependency>
    		<groupId>org.osgi</groupId>
    		<artifactId>org.osgi.core</artifactId>
    		<version>4.3.1</version>
    		<scope>provided</scope>
    	</dependency>


After fixing the above all issues, finally I have built aries using jdk7 successfully.

comments.body: What's the status on this? I just cloned the Git mirror and tried to build with java version "1.7.0_51" and the error is still present.
I will submit a new updated patch about that.
Patch with full Java7 support, refactoring of the parents, ...

GitHub user jbonofre opened a pull request:

    https://github.com/apache/aries/pull/13

    [ARIES-1006] Full compilation support with JDK 7

    Patch to fully support compilation with JDK 7

You can merge this pull request into a Git repository by running:

    $ git pull https://github.com/jbonofre/aries ARIES-1006

Alternatively you can review and apply these changes as the patch at:

    https://github.com/apache/aries/pull/13.patch

To close this pull request, make a commit to your master/trunk branch
with (at least) the following in the commit message:

    This closes #13
    
----
commit 58c28575d2f030ae848805796d357becbe760db9
Author: Jean-Baptiste Onofré <jbonofre@apache.org>
Date:   2014-05-19T19:35:21Z

    [ARIES-1006] Full compilation support with JDK 7

----
It's now done: Aries trunk compiles with JDK 7 (including the itests upgraded to Pax Exam 3.4.0, and the bundles upgraded to OSGi 4.3.1).
